mean_cn: vt. 装作顾客在商店偷窃；  vi. 装作顾客在商店偷窃
mean_en: to steal things from a shop or store
word_etyma: shop商店 + lift偷窃 → shoplift 从店中偷商品
short_phrase: shoplift some items from the store
sentence: To shoplift beauty products from the store gave her a thrill - until she got caught.
sentence_trans: 在商店偷窃一些漂亮的玩意儿让她很激动---直到她被抓起来。
